# Product Requirements Document (PRD)

## 1. Overview
This project is a personal UX portfolio website created during the Vibe Coding Hackathon.  
The goal is to present my background, skills, and projects in a clear and accessible way.

## 2. Target Users
- Recruiters
- Professors
- Fellow students
- Design professionals

## 3. Goals
- Introduce myself as a UX designer
- Showcase my skills and experience
- Provide easy access to my CV and portfolio

## 4. Main Sections
- Home / Hero section
- About me
- CV
- Portfolio projects
- Contact information

## 5. Success Criteria
- The website runs locally
- Content is personalized
- Information is easy to understand
